article: the owner of a bodega in brooklyn opened fire on a group of five teen-agers who he suspected were trying to steal junk food thursday night , killing one , a ##-year-old shot in the back , and wounding another as they ran out of the store , police said .
abstract: teen-ager dies in shooting at bodega ; owner held
